result.eng: For a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ga: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.orig: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oiread
result.html: Níor ceadaíodh ach correitilt sa tír go ceann seachtaine eile agus ar ndóigh ba bheag duine a bhí ag iarraidh eitilt ach oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
result.ponchtml: Níor ceadaíoḋ aċ correitilt sa tír go ceann seaċtaine eile agus ar ndóiġ ba ḃeag duine a ḃí ag iarraiḋ eitilt aċ oireadFor a whole week, flights were grounded in the country with only occasional exceptions and, of course, hardly anybody even wanted to fly.
